entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning and in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 50 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
